posts.topic_title: [JAVA] Clean Code with Explanations and Running Time [2 Solutions]

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {--newline--        return (int)((-1 + Math.sqrt(1 + 8 * (long)n)) / 2);--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--

public class Solution {--newline--    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {   --newline--            //convert int to long to prevent integer overflow--newline--            long nLong = (long)n;--newline--            --newline--            long st = 0;--newline--            long ed = nLong;--newline--            --newline--            long mid = 0;--newline--            --newline--            while (st <= ed){--newline--                mid = st + (ed - st) / 2;--newline--                --newline--                if (mid * (mid + 1) <= 2 * nLong){--newline--                    st = mid + 1;--newline--                }else{--newline--                    ed = mid - 1;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--            --newline--            return (int)(st - 1);--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
public class Solution {--newline--    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {--newline--            return (int) Math.floor((-1 + Math.sqrt(1+8L*n))/2.0);--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
posts.topic_title: [C][JAVA] Elegant One Line of Code, Clear Explanation Provided
